dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Pennington
Richard Socher
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: GloVe is a model for distributed word representation that captures global statistical information of words in a corpus, allowing for semantic relationships to be represented in vector space.
dcterms:title: GloVe 2014

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Edouard Grave
Piotr Bojanowski
Christian Puhrsch
Armand Joulin
dcterms:description: fastText is an extension of the word2vec model that allows for the representation of words as bags of character n-grams, improving the handling of rare words and out-of-vocabulary words.
dcterms:title: fastText 2017

dcterms:creator: Saif M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: The NRC-VAD Lexicon provides human ratings of valence, arousal, and dominance for approximately 20,000 English words, facilitating the study of emotional content in language.
dcterms:title: NRC-VAD Lexicon

dcterms:creator: Robyn Speer
Joshua Chin
Andrew Lin
Sara Jewett
Lance Nathan
dcterms:description: Word frequency data provides estimates of word frequency based on multiple language resources, useful for linguistic analysis and natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Word Frequency Data

dcterms:creator: Mohamed Abdalla
Moustafa Abdalla
dcterms:description: The Big Tech Target Words dataset includes a list of company names defined as 'big tech', used for analyzing gender bias in language associated with these companies.
dcterms:title: Big Tech Target Words
